comment.author: 79334698@N00
comment._content: www.smithsonianmag.com/history-archaeology/pietown.html?c... Great article with the history of Pie Town inspired by these photographs.

comment.author: 23259836@N08
comment._content: The corn has already been picked. The implement the guy is riding is an undercutter. It has a blade underneath that cuts the corn stalks. The fodder was probably hauled in for cow feed.

comment.author: 23393335@N06
comment._content: Thanks! I thought it was a home-made corn harvester;-)
